text: [Music] Hello agriculture enthusiasts. Today we will explore some incredible moments in agriculture together. Get ready to witness stunning scenes from the harvest season where the fruits of labor are gathered. Around June or July, when raspberries turn sweet and red, it's the perfect time for harvest. A raspberry harvester moves along each row of raspberry bushes.
